thread.title: Divorcing Kaley Cuoco picks cute way to thank fans

title: Divorcing Kaley Cuoco picks cute way to thank fans
text:

Kaley Cuoco, famous for being adorable, recognizes a fellow cutie. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Divorcing Kaley Cuoco picks cute way to thank fans Maria Puente, USA TODAY 10:21 p.m. EDT October 22, 2015 Kaley Cuoco in Beverly Hills in March 2015. (Photo: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
( USA TODAY ) -- Is there any character from literature more endearing than Winnie-the-Pooh? Kaley Cuoco, famous for being adorable, recognizes a fellow cutie. 
The $28.5 million-a-year Big Bang Theory star is overflowing with gratitude for her fans' support now that she's splitting from her tennis-player husband, Ryan Sweeting. So she reached back to the early 20th-century story and poetry books by A.A. Milne to express her feelings. 
Cuoco, one of Hollywood's two highest-paid actresses, posted a message on her Instagram page, illustrated with a E. H. Shepard drawing and quote from Winnie-the-Pooh , first published in 1926. A photo posted by @normancook on Oct 20, 2015 at 8:48pm PDT 
Cuoco said she was "completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support," even from people she doesn't know. 
"I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life," she said in the post. 
The post attracted more than 62,000 likes, many with stay-strong messages from adoring fans.
